message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity not only to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate but also to potentially save yourself $3,000 compared to the market value. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of serving you soon.
